gui.object

Class GUIObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.object.GUIObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageObject

    public abstract class GUIObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Base abstract class for all objects, containing required methods and fields.
    Author:
    Jani
